alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otsego and central Chenango Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 931 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norwich, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Guilford, Coventry, Oxford, Bainbridge, Preston, Otego, Gilbertsville, German and Mc Donough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
